onboarding.welcome_message: Welcome to recipe vault, where you can store all your favourite recipes locally and securely!
onboarding.explore_message: Dive into your personal library and explore! Easily search and filter your favourite recipes on your device!
onboarding.plan_message: Plan and shop with ease! Schedule meals for the week & add ingredients directly to your shopping list.
onboarding.share_message: Share your recipes and meal plans with up to 2 friends using our syncing feature and shared cloud vault.

chip_list.delete_item_message:
Are you sure you want to delete {{itemName}} ?

This will remove it from all recipes.

credits.title: Credits.
credits.special_thanks: Special thanks to all contributors and open-source projects that made this app possible.

groceries.title: Groceries List
groceries.empty_message: No Groceries make sure to add some groceries to your list or choose a different list.
groceries.permission_denied: Reminder permissions are required to manage your grocery list. Please enable them in your device settings.
groceries.enable_permissions_message: Reminder permissions are required to manage your grocery list. Please enable them in your device settings.

info_bottom_sheet.title: Grocery List Info
info_bottom_sheet.description: Effortlessly manage your grocery lists and add ingredients from your favorite recipes. Share with others and let Apple Reminders handle the rest!

select_grocery_list.title: Choose which reminders list you would like to link with

help.title: Help.
help.mail_template:
Hi,

I'm reaching out for help with Recipe Vault. Here's my issue:

[Please describe your issue here]

image_picker.camera_permission_denied: Permission to access camera was denied, please enable it in settings
image_picker.library_permission_denied: Permission to access library was denied, please enable it in settings

purchase_screen.title: Upgrade to pro vault
purchase_screen.sync_feature: Sync unlimited recipes to the cloud.
purchase_screen.share_feature: Share your pro vault with up to 2 friends and family.
purchase_screen.support_feature: Help support the development of Recipe Vault.

welcome_onboarding.title: Welcome to Your Recipe Vault!
welcome_onboarding.subtitle: Start by creating a cloud vault to sync your recipes with friends and family, or join an existing one to discover and contribute. Let’s get cooking!

profile.title: Off to a great start!
profile.subtitle: Now enter a username to get started. This will be visible to others in your shared vault.
profile.error_message: Please use only letters for your username. Special characters are not allowed.

join_vault.description: Have a vault code? Enter it here to join a cloud vault and explore a world of recipes with up to two friends or family. If you don’t have one, consider creating your own vault!
join_vault.title: Join a Vault

error_messages.default: An error occurred. Please try again later.

login.title: Login to create a Cloud Vault!
login.feature2: Share your vault with up to 2 friends and family
login.feature3: Join shared vaults of other users

image_text_selection.generate_recipe_description: Choose a field and start highlighting the text. Tap ‘Generate Recipe’ when you’re ready!
image_text_selection.choose_field_description: Adjust your selection by dragging or resizing. Tap ‘Add Selection’ when you’re ready!
image_text_selection.title: Title
image_text_selection.onboarding_description:
To get started, just tap and drag to select the text you want to extract.

Then add the selection to the recipe by tapping the green button.

Don't forget to select the type of field you are adding! 🥳

support_app.title: Support the App
support_app.description: By giving a tip. This will help me continue to improve the app and add new features.
support_app.thank_you: Thank you for supporting the app!

switch_vault.local_message: Are you sure you want to switch to your local vault?
switch_vault.cloud_message: Are you sure you want to switch to your cloud vault?

clear_database.error_message: There was an issue clearing the database.
clear_database.message: Are you sure you want to clear the database?
clear_database.title: Clear Database

copy.message: The content has been copied to your clipboard.
copy.title: Content Copied!

delete_account.error_message: Contact customer support there was an issue deleting you account.
delete_account.message: Are you sure you want to delete your account? You cannot reverse this! Any Purchases made will be lost.
delete_account.title: Delete Account

discard_changes.message: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to discard them and leave the screen?
discard_changes.title: Discard changes?

reset_database.message: Are you sure you want to reset the database?
reset_database.title: Reset Database

delete_cloud_vault.title: Delete Cloud Vault: {{currentDatabaseName}}
delete_cloud_vault.message:
Are you sure you want to delete your cloud data?

 You cannot reverse this! Any Purchases made will be lost.

advance_settings.title: Advance Vault Settings.
advance_settings.danger_zone_description: Having trouble with your database? Be careful with these settings. This action is irreversible.

errors.deleting_vault: There was an issue deleting your vault.

account_settings.title: Account Settings.
account_settings.name: Name
account_settings.danger_zone_description: Be careful with these settings. This action is irreversible.

limitation.title: Why the limitation ?
limitation.description1: Our goal is to give everyone a taste by offering 5 recipe slots for free, you can explore the benefits of cloud syncing and see how it fits into your cooking routine.
limitation.description2: If you find that 5 slots aren’t enough, you can always upgrade to our Pro Vault at a later point.
